title: Correction: Meta, not Microsoft
text:
Meta is a member of the Frontier consortium of blue-chip companies, not Microsoft as incorrectly stated in a column last weekend.

Source: 2022 'Correction: Meta, not Microsoft' FT.com 24 June. Used under licence from the Financial Times. Â© The Financial Times Limited 2022. All Rights Reserved.
